subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Blue Jackets overcame a 3-0 deficit for their first home playoff victory in the franchise’s 13 seasons, sending the series back to Pittsburgh on Saturday night tied at 2-2.
snippet: The Blue Jackets overcame a 3-0 deficit for their first home playoff victory in the franchise’s 13 seasons, sending the series back to Pittsburgh on Saturday night tied at 2-2.
